## **Introduction**


*massprocesser* is a R package which is used to process raw metabolomics data.

Please install it via [github](https://github.com/tidymass/massprocesser).

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE,R.options="", cache=TRUE}
if(!require(devtools)){
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/massprocesser")
```

We use the demo data in `demoData` package to show how to use `massprocesser`. Link is here: [https://github.com/jaspershen/demoData/tree/master/inst/mzxml/POS](https://github.com/jaspershen/demoData/tree/master/inst/mzxml/POS)

***

## **Usage**

Please see the Help document page to get the instruction of `massprocesser`.
